sentence.Network_en: Two or three tragic cries, although they were very low, echoed lingeringly in the night.
sentence.Network_cn: 接着水面上又发出了两三声哀叫, 这叫声虽然很低, 但是它的凄惨的余音已经渗透了整个黑夜.

sentence.Network_en: Her voice was swift, yet ever the last words fell lingeringly.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的语速很快, 然而最后的几句话却慢了下来.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(L) ... lingering 延迟的 lingeringly 延迟地 lingo 方言.

means.word_mean: 1. in a slow, leisurely or prolonged way;

sentences.sentence: "her voice was swift, yet ever the last words fell lingeringly" -Rossetti

auth_sentence.content: When we were introduced, he shook my hand, and held on to it lingeringly, I thought.
auth_sentence.res_content: When we were introduced, he shook my hand, and held on to it lingeringly, I thought.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When we were introduced, he shook my hand, and held on to it lingeringly, I thought.
